name: Hit Dude: ragdoll smasher
description:
You have your own customizable rag doll, you can electrocute, burn it, shoot it, etc.
It has graceful movements thanks to realistic physics.
Select the weapon and smash the rag doll, you will earn virtual money the more times you hit it.
The funniest and free clicker game is called Hit Dude!

Benefits:
* High voltage current, electrocute your ragdoll
* Semiautomatic pistol
* Darts: use your doll as a target
* Tomatoes: full of tomatoes to your dummy, like tomatina
* Super bomb: shatter and crush your dude

Customizable:
* Change the look of your doll
* Several eyes to choose
* Several mouths
* Various hairstyles
